text:
This place is a gem for karaoke enthusiasts!! ‚ú® The medium-sized rooms are cozy, stylish, and uniquely designed to ensure maximum comfort and fun. The up-to-date song system allows you to belt out all the latest hits from their extensive library, making it a fantastic experience for everyone. Their sound system also is a top tier !‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

not only that they also serves food and drinks to you. From the refreshing Fizzy Grapefruit Citrus Vitamin C to the mouthwatering Mix Popcorn Chicken, Chicken Yakitori, and the Mix Platter (which was a birthday special and free for birthday customers!),

the variety and quality of the food are impressive. The service is top-notch, with dishes delivered right to your room, adding to the overall convenience and enjoyment.

It is located at Eco Galleria, this karaoke spot is easily accessible and offers a memorable experience for groups of friends or family gatherings. Whether you're celebrating a special occasion or just looking for a fun night out, GIO KTV is the go-to place for an unforgettable karaoke experience. Definitely recommend it ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

Had a great time at Gio KTV! The rooms were clean, comfortable, and well-equipped with a good sound system and a wide song selection. Staff were friendly and helpful throughout the booking and check-in process.
Very nice family ktv you can enjoy with friends and family

Very happy that Eco Botanic (Galleria) have karaoke!!!ü•≥ near my living place!
the environment here is fantastic! neat and clean. Crew are friendly and helpful :)

1. The sound system is excellent and we're singing high.
2. The service staff was very smart and considerate and they were very surprised to help us warm up the food.
3. Environment is clean (maybe it's new)

ps:counter free one hour. COME BACK here next time!!!
